scripts.refresh-dependencies: rimraf ./node_modules/p2p-media-loader-core/ && rimraf ./node_modules/p2p-media-loader-hlsjs/ && npm install && npm update && copyfiles -f ./node_modules/p2p-media-loader-core/p2p-media-loader-core.min.js ./ && copyfiles -f ./node_modules/p2p-media-loader-hlsjs/p2p-media-loader-hlsjs.min.js ./
